name: FreshRSS
short_description: Self-hosted RSS/Atom feed aggregator with multi-user support and powerful filtering.
description: FreshRSS is a free, self-hosted, powerful RSS feed aggregator designed for reading and organizing news from multiple sources. It features a clean, modern interface, support for multiple users with individual preferences, powerful filtering and search, categorization, favorites, reading history, media playback (podcasts, videos), OPML import/export, and extensions for additional features. It's a great replacement for Google Reader and online services like Feedly. Stay updated with your favorite blogs, news sites, YouTube channels, and podcasts in one place without any tracking.
usecases: Aggregate all your favorite blogs and news sources into one private reader.
Follow YouTube channels and get video updates alongside text content.
Share subscriptions with family members using multi-user support.
Use filters and categories to organize feeds by topic or priority.
notes: Supports OPML import for migrating from other feed readers
Can refresh feeds automatically on a schedule
Mobile-friendly interface works well on phones
